<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Sun Wukong (The Monkey King)](/Deities.aspx?ID=183)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Live life freely, drink, play pranks

**Anathema** Refuse a reasonable bet or duel, let social pressure change your behavior

**Follower Alignments**
CG, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

**Favored Weapon** [Bo Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167)

- **3rd**
[Mad Monkeys](/Spells.aspx?ID=702)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

</column>
name: Sun Wukong (The Monkey King)
